digest_items.title: Use secure file upload validation
digest_items.why: Malicious file uploads can lead to remote code execution
digest_items.fix: Validate file types, scan for malware, and store uploads outside webroot

digest_items.title: Use secure cookie flags
digest_items.why: Insecure cookies can be stolen via XSS or transmitted over HTTP
digest_items.fix: Set HttpOnly, Secure, and SameSite flags on all cookies

digest_items.title: Use security headers scanner
digest_items.why: Missing security headers leave applications vulnerable to common attacks
digest_items.fix: Use securityheaders.com to scan and implement recommended headers

digest_items.title: Implement DMARC policy
digest_items.why: DMARC builds on SPF and DKIM to give domain owners control over email authentication

digest_items.title: Review user access permissions
digest_items.why: Stale permissions from former employees pose security risk
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly access reviews and remove unnecessary permissions
